# BCWaterDischargeAnalysis 2017-07-07

- Changed Q.compute.percentile.stat to compute statistics on both calendar year (CY) and water year (WY) basis.
- Changed Q.stat.annual to compute CY_MEDIAN, WY_MEDIAN, CY_DATE_33P, WY_DATE_33P. 
- Added CY_MEDIAN, WY_MEDIAN, CY_DATE_33P, WY_DATE_33P to plots.
- Updated vignettes to reflect changes.

# BCWaterDischargeAnalysis 2017-06-30

- Changed Q.compute.longterm.stat to compute statistics on both calendar year (CY) and water year (WY) basis.
- Updated vignettes to reflect changes.
